And I'm constantly exhausted
and running late, and I can't sleep because I have this medical debt

translation.en: that just grows like some mold in a basement.

translation.en: Okay. Fine.
Ma.
[Mom] I'm okay. I know.
I'm sorry.
[voice breaking] I should be able to provide for you.

translation.en: You know me. I'm just on my own weird journey,

…I love it.
Thanks.

[man] Let's go.

Get it together, Cass.
-[chuckles] -[knocking on door]

-[door unlocks] -Frankie?

I'm ready.

[sighs] I was hoping that you might marry me.

Not exactly. Um…

translation.zh: 拜托 你不是这种人

translation.en: Okay, no one asked you, so could you not?
translation.zh: 好吧 没人问你 你可以不要多事吗？

translation.en: -And why wouldn't this be a real marriage? -I don't know, because you're not in love?
translation.zh: -为什么这不是真正的婚姻？-我不知道 因为你们并不相爱？

translation.en: Uh-- But we respect each other. We're not in love, but we love each other.
translation.zh: 但我们互相尊重我们没有相爱 但我们爱着对方

translation.en: -[Frankie sighs] -We'd be able to sleep with other people,
translation.zh: 我们还可以和其他人上床

translation.en: which sounds like the healthiest marriage ever.
translation.zh: 这听起来是有史以来最健康的婚姻

translation.en: You'd be ripping off the government.
translation.zh: 你这是在敲政府的竹杠

translation.en: -I'd be ripping off the government? -Yeah.
The government that made my mom pay taxes for ten years
before giving her the right to vote? That government?
translation.zh: 但不给她投票权的那个政府吗？

translation.en: So your mom was living here illegally then?
translation.zh: 你妈妈是非法来这里的？

translation.en: Don't tell me you're a resident of Southern California
translation.zh: 不要告诉我 你是南加州的居民

translation.en: that does not see how this state was built off the backs of illegal immigrants.
translation.zh: 你不知道这个州是如何在非法移民的支持下建立起来的

translation.en: Like my mom, who crossed that border, lived here for ten years,
translation.zh: 就像我妈妈 她穿过边境在这里生活了十年

translation.en: worked their asses off for ten years, paying taxes for your government,
translation.zh: 勤勤恳恳工作了十年为你们的政府纳税

translation.en: and were treated like less than citizens.
Yeah, I will proudly rip off the government.
translation.zh: 没错 我会很骄傲地敲政府的竹杠

translation.en: You got anything else to say, Commando?
translation.zh: 你还有别的话要说吗 突击队员？

translation.en: Dude, this is a trap.
[laughs] This will not end well for you.
translation.zh: 你的下场一定会很难看

translation.en: -I was just trying to help. -[Cassie] Mmm.
Thanks for your help.
-Why is he even here? -He's my bunkmate, okay?
translation.zh: -他怎么会在这里？-他是我的室友 好吗？

translation.en: He's got nowhere else to stay while we are on leave.
translation.zh: 我们休假的时候 他没地方住

translation.en: Please play nice.
So?
Cass, I can't.
Okay? I'm… I'm sorry.
Plus, I don't think my girlfriend's gonna understand me having a wife.
translation.zh: 而且 我觉得我女朋友不会理解我有个老婆

translation.en: What? You got back together with Riley?
Yeah. Yeah. I'm… I'm all in.
[Cassie] I remember when you met her, like, in fifth grade.
translation.zh: 我记得你从五年级起就认识她了

translation.en: That's great.
Well, that was crazy. [laughs]
I should go.
There are tourists to be shuttled and food to be delivered.
translation.zh: 我要开大巴带游客观光 还要送餐

translation.en: -Cass, you know if I had the money-- -No, Frankie, stop.
translation.zh: -卡茜 你知道如果我有钱…-弗兰基 别说了

translation.en: I'll figure it out.
-Stay safe, okay? -[Frankie] Yeah, you too.
translation.zh: -注意安全 好吗？再见-好 你也是

translation.en: Her parents can't help?
Yeah, um…
Her mom's a nursing assistant, so it's not like there's anything extra leftover.
translation.zh: 她妈妈是护士助理所以没有多余的钱

translation.en: Dad dipped out when she was born. Sounds like he was a bad dude.
translation.zh: 她爸爸在她出生那会儿就跑了听起来就是个混蛋

translation.en: -[Luke] That explains a lot. -[door opens]
-Hey! Are you trying to sneak up on me? -[boy giggling]
translation.zh: 嘿 你是不是想偷偷吓我一跳？

translation.en: Gonna make my going-away plate. -Let's go get some food! -[boy laughing]
translation.zh: 去做为我送行的大餐我们去吃东西吧！

translation.en: [man] Come here. Give me a kiss. Bye.
translation.zh: 过来 亲我一下 再见

translation.en: All right, see ya.
[boy] Bye, Grandpa.
-[horn honks] -[boy] Love you.
Yeah, yeah, yeah. [grunts]
-Uncle Luke? What are you doing? -[laughing]
-Think fast. -[Luke] Yeah, you are.
You ready? You ready?
Give me the ball.
-[Luke] No, me. No, me. No, me. -[boy] Me.
[boy] Mom, I found Uncle Luke hiding.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我找到卢克叔叔藏在哪了

translation.en: -Oh my… Luke? -[Luke laughs] Busted.
[woman] We didn't think we'd see you before deployment.
translation.zh: 没想到在你出征前还能见到你

translation.en: -What? [laughs] -Hi, Hailey.
Wow. It's like hugging a tree trunk. [laughs]
translation.zh: 就像抱着一个树桩一样

translation.en: I didn't think it was possible to get so buff in eight months.
translation.zh: 真没想到八个月你就变得这么肌肉发达

translation.en: What do you think, Spence? Should I join the Marines?
translation.zh: 你觉得呢 斯宾塞？我该加入海军陆战队吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. Yes. -Should I get all ripped like Uncle Luke?
translation.zh: -是-我该像卢克叔叔一样满身肌肉吗？

translation.en: -[Hailey] Yes! -[all laugh]
You, uh… [chuckles]
-You look just like Dad with that haircut. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 你留这个发型看起来就像爸爸

translation.en: Gimme a hug.
-Bring it in. [grunts] -Good to see you, man.
Where's he been?
You know, Dad's off for the day, so you can breathe.
translation.zh: 爸爸今天休息 你可以喘口气了

translation.en: I think he doesn't wanna see me even more than I don't wanna see him.
translation.zh: 我不想见他 但他好像更不想见我

translation.en: The man would have to express some kinda emotion for me to know how he's feeling about you.
translation.zh: 他需要对我表达一些情感才会明白对你的感受

translation.en: -He made it clear when he cut me off. -[brother] Come on, Luke.
translation.zh: -他跟我断绝关系时说得很清楚-好了 卢克

translation.en: Dad had to draw the line somewhere. You were so out of control.
translation.zh: 爸爸总要定点规矩你当时完全失控了

translation.en: Yeah.
What's going on, Luke?
I owe some money.
We've been here before, and you know…
translation.zh: 我们之前谈过这个 你知道…

translation.en: You know I can't help you.
Yeah. No, no, I… I know.
[brother] Is it that piece of shit Johnno, again?
translation.zh: -我知道-又是那个人渣约翰诺吗？

translation.en: -What happens if you don't pay? -Not paying isn't an option.
translation.zh: -如果你不还钱会怎样？-我必须还钱

translation.en: -He better not come near my family. -[Luke] I'm sorry. -I'm just in a bad spot. -[brother] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -他最好不要接近我的家人-对不起 我只是遇到了麻烦

translation.en: I… I just got my pay, so this isn't everything.
translation.zh: 我刚拿到薪水 所以这不是全部

translation.en: -But I'll get the rest to you soon. -Like when?
translation.zh: -但我很快就会把剩下的给你-什么时候？

translation.en: I'm losing my patience.
I waited for you through your stupid rehab,
translation.zh: 我等着你从戒毒所出来

translation.en: and now you're shipping out of town,
showing up with a coupla hundred bucks when you owe me 15 grand?
translation.zh: 欠我一万五 带着几百美金就来了？

translation.en: -[Luke] I think I've got a plan. -[Johnno] You better explain.
translation.zh: 听着 我想我有个计划 你最好跟我说明白

translation.en: [Luke] Just take it easy, man.
Don't make me use this. You gotta pay me.
translation.zh: 别逼我用这个 但你得还钱

translation.en: Hear me out. I'm gonna pay you.
-I… I know how. -[Johnno] How?
[Luke] I met this girl who needs health insurance.
translation.zh: 一个需要医疗保险的女孩

translation.en: And if we get married, I get extra money each month from the military.
translation.zh: 如果我们结婚我每个月都会有额外的津贴

translation.en: I'll give you my cut. Okay?
translation.zh: 我会把剩下的钱还给你 好吗？

translation.en: -[Johnno] You sure? -Yeah, I'm sure. It's gonna be fine.
translation.zh: -你确定？-我确定 不会有问题

translation.en: So be smart.
This better work.
Enjoy your honeymoon.
[Luke] Hi.
-Hi. -Thanks for meeting with me.
[gasps] Is your dad in the parking lot waiting to cuff me?
translation.zh: 你爸爸在停车场等着给我铐手铐吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Funny.
[whispering] You're acting kinda sus.
Yeah. Well, if we do this, if…
translation.zh: 好 如果我们这么做的话…

translation.en: We need to be very careful. All right? We need a story.
translation.zh: 我们需要非常小心 好吗？我们需要编一个故事

translation.en: You and I didn't get along at the bar the other night.
The others saw that, but the next night,
translation.zh: 大家都看到了 但第二天晚上

translation.en: I was very charming and persistent, and I convinced you to go out with me.
translation.zh: 我很有魅力 也很执着我说服了你和我约会

translation.en: -[Cassie] You did? -Mm-hmm.
[snorts] Was it hot? When you asked me out? Very.
translation.zh: -你约我出去的场面性感吗？-性感爆棚

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm just gonna need you to explain yourself,
because a week ago you were lecturing me on how this is fraud, so…
translation.zh: 因为一周前你还教育我这是诈骗

translation.en: -It is fraud. I don't wanna do this. -Okay, so… don't.
translation.zh: 这就是诈骗 我不想这么做 好 那就别这样

translation.en: [Luke] Believe me. If I had any other choice, I wouldn't be.
translation.zh: 相信我 但凡我有其他选择就不会这样做

translation.en: Marriage should be for love. And where I come from, it's for life.
translation.zh: 婚姻应该建立在爱情的基础上在我看来 婚姻是一辈子的事

translation.en: Do you come from a fantasy land?
Because, where I come from in reality, marriage is really just
translation.zh: 因为就我来说 在现实世界中婚姻真的只是一种

translation.en: a pointless legal arrangement that turns lovers into enemies, so…
translation.zh: 毫无意义的法律安排把恋人变成敌人

translation.en: -Why don't you have another choice? -How's that your business?
translation.zh: -为什么你别无选择？-不关你的事

translation.en: Kind of is. I am possibly about to marry you. Why?
translation.zh: 怎么不关我的事？我可能就要嫁给你了 到底为什么？

translation.en: I need the extra two grand a month married guys get.
translation.zh: 我需要我们每个月多得的两千美元

translation.en: That's it? And I'm supposed to trust you here?
translation.zh: 就这样？我凭什么相信你？

translation.en: Trust me? Okay. Look, if I can trust a lib
translation.zh: 相信我？好吧 听着如果我可以信任一个

translation.en: who doesn't give a shit about the law or the military, I can sure--
translation.zh: 对法律或军队毫不在意的自由主义者…

translation.en: I have an ethical code that doesn't include blind obedience,
translation.zh: 我遵循排斥盲目服从的道德准则

translation.en: and I desperately need this to literally survive.
translation.zh: 而且我迫切需要这笔钱来活命

translation.en: Whereas you could be, I don't know,
stockpiling supplies for your bro-militia.
translation.zh: 你那厌女组织储备物资

translation.en: I'm leaving. This was a mistake. "Bro-militia."
translation.zh: 我要走了 真不该来 厌女男

translation.en: -Luke. Luke. -[Luke] Liberal nut.
What?
-Look, I don't like you. -[scoffs]
No shit.
But you seem solid. So…
translation.zh: 但你看起来很靠谱 所以…

translation.en: I'm sorry, okay?
Please.
[Luke] Listen. I need you to know what you're getting yourself into.
translation.zh: 听着 我希望你知道自己会陷入什么处境

translation.en: If we're caught, I get court-martialed.
translation.zh: 如果被抓到 我会被告上军事法庭

translation.en: As in, arrested and maybe doing time.
Okay.
Look, this is already gonna be a shotgun wedding. We're gonna be on their radar.
translation.zh: 这会是一场仓促的婚礼我们会受到监视

translation.en: So, once I get over there, to Iraq,
translation.zh: 所以 等我被派去伊拉克

translation.en: we've… we've got to just, like, set up consistent times where we are gonna speak, okay?
translation.zh: 我们要保持固定的联系 好吗？

translation.en: We gotta make this look normal, like a real marriage.
translation.zh: 我们得让这场婚姻看起来很正常而且真实

translation.en: We'd have to write some romantic emails in case somebody reads them.
translation.zh: 我们得写一些浪漫的邮件以防有人查阅

translation.en: We just have to keep it tight for my tour.
translation.zh: 我被派遣期间 要保持说服力

translation.en: And once I'm back here, we file for divorce.
translation.zh: 等我回来后 我们就申请离婚

translation.en: And that gives you a year of free health insurance.
translation.zh: 这场婚姻会为你提供一年的免费医疗保险

translation.en: And we can split the cash down the middle. -Yeah? -Great.
And one more small thing. I deploy Friday morning.
translation.zh: 还有一件小事 我周五早上就出发

translation.en: We'd also have to go out with my company.
translation.zh: 我们要在我兄弟们面前出去约会

translation.en: Act like we… [exhales]
-Like we like each other. -[laughs]
Yeah, more than that. Like, love each other.
translation.zh: 对 不止如此 要彼此相爱

translation.en: And, um… [exhales]
So, all married couples spend the night at this motel near base.
translation.zh: 所有已婚夫妇都会在基地附近的一家汽车旅馆过夜

translation.en: -It means we would have to. -Super.
translation.zh: -这意味着我们也必须如此-真棒

translation.en: So, are we out of "if" territory?
Are we doing this?
Yeah.
Yeah, we're doing this.
translation.zh: 对 我们就要这样做

translation.en: But you can't tell anybody that doesn't need to know.
You have to promise.
I promise.
In fact,
I pinky swear.
-No, I'm not doing that. -We're getting married, man.
translation.zh: -不 我不要这么做-我们都要结婚了

translation.en: I'll text you.
-No. -What?
You can't wear that.
-Why? -Because we're taking wedding photos.
You have to dress a certain way.
-Really? -No. I'm coming up.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-不行 我要上去了

translation.en: There's no fluffy virgin white wedding dress in there, Commando.
translation.zh: 里面没有蓬松的处女白色婚纱突击队员

translation.en: Stop calling me that.
Make yourself comfortable.
Do you play?
No, it's just to impress guys.
translation.zh: 不会 只是为了打动男人

translation.en: -[chuckles] -[Cassie] You impressed? [laughs]
I'm a musician.
It's what I do.
My band and I have been working at it for like, five years.
translation.zh: 我和我的乐队已经演出五年了

translation.en: That's gotta be rough.
Rough would be punching the clock at some soul-sucking job
translation.zh: 艰难就是暗无天日的工作上下班打卡

translation.en: while I'm just making the rich richer.
translation.zh: 结果只是让富人更富有

translation.en: I'd rather hustle for my art any day.
translation.zh: 我宁愿每天为了我的艺术而奔波

translation.en: -Uh… [clears throat] -[Cassie] Uh, hi.
So, what does the tattoo say?
-"Socialism Now"? -[laughs]
You're really clever.
No, it says…
translation.zh: 不 写的是… “不入虎穴 焉得虎子”

translation.en: -Someone, something, I-- [chuckles] -Risk nothing, gain nothing.
translation.zh: -什么 我…-不入虎穴 焉得虎子

translation.en: It's something my grandma said to my mom when she moved to America.
translation.zh: 只是我妈妈搬来美国时外婆对她说的话

translation.en: Hello, my prince.
Today is the day that our credit scores shall become intertwined.
translation.zh: 今天之后我们的信用分数会交织在一起

translation.en: [Luke] You know, you really look the part.
translation.zh: -你看起来进入角色了-这是什么意思？

translation.en: -[Cassie] What does that mean? -[Luke] You look pretty.
translation.zh: -你看起来进入角色了-这是什么意思？ 你很漂亮

translation.en: [Cassie chuckles] Your blushing bride.
[woman] Ahh! You look so beautiful! Congratulations.
We're so proud of you.
translation.zh: 来 抱一下 我们真为你感到骄傲

translation.en: [bride] This is the best day of my life.
translation.zh: 这是我一生中最美好的一天

translation.en: Oh my goodness. This is so exciting.
Hi. Thank you for coming.
Of course.
Oh, did you get rings?
-Uh… -[Frankie] Here.
Oh my God, you bought a real ring?
translation.zh: 天啊 你买了一枚真正的戒指？

translation.en: -Well-- -Me.
I did.
-[Cassie] What? -I got it for Riley.
-I've been saving up since I enlisted. -Frankie.
translation.zh: -我入伍后就一直在存钱-弗兰基

translation.en: No, I can't accept this.
I didn't wanna ask her now and then just ship out.
translation.zh: 我不想现在向她求婚 然后就出征

translation.en: Like, I wanna be her husband.
You know, do it right.
And… And Mom wants me to wait 'til I'm 21, when I get back, so, uh…
translation.zh: 我妈想等我回来满21岁再说 所以…

translation.en: Just keep it warm for me.
[clerk] Luke Morrow and Casandra Salazar.
translation.zh: 卢克·莫罗和卡珊德拉·萨拉扎

translation.en: Shit.
We are gathered here today
to join you two together in lawful matrimony.
And your witness today?
Frankie.
That's me. How ya doing?
-Hi, Frankie. -[Frankie] Hiya.
[minister] Luke Morrow, do you pledge to love this woman,
translation.zh: 卢克·莫罗 你愿意发誓爱这个人

translation.en: to be true and loyal to her,
and to comfort and keep her in sickness and in health?
translation.zh: 无论疾病还是健康都会安慰她、照顾她吗？

translation.en: I do.
Casandra Salazar, do you pledge to love this man,
translation.zh: 卡珊德拉·萨拉扎你愿意发誓爱这个人

translation.en: to be true and loyal to him,
and to comfort and keep him in sickness and in health?
translation.zh: 无论疾病还是健康都会安慰他、照顾他吗？

translation.en: I do.
[minister] By the power vested in me by the great State of California,
translation.zh: 根据加利福尼亚州赋予我的合法权力

translation.en: I now pronounce you husband and wife.
translation.zh: 我宣布你们正式结为夫妻

translation.en: You may kiss the bride. [chuckles]
Congratulations.
Drink up, boys! Here's to the second platoon, baby!
translation.zh: 干杯 伙计们！ 敬二排 兄弟们！

translation.en: -[all cheering] -Shipping out tomorrow.
-On one! -[marine 1] Click it! Get in there.
translation.zh: -一口闷！-来啊 宝贝 过来！

translation.en: [all] No shit!
-Whoo! -Wait, wait, wait!
-And to the newlyweds! -Adorable.
[marines] Ah! -Considering you hated each other. -[Riley] Look at you, guys.
translation.zh: -你们之前还看不上对方-看看你们俩

translation.en: -[marine cheering, laughing] -Thank you.
-[marine 1] Newlyweds! -[all cheering]
[marine 2] Dude, I can't believe you married her, and you're shipping out the next day.
translation.zh: 兄弟 我不敢相信你娶了她你第二天就要出征了

translation.en: How are you doing?
-You know, a-about them leaving so soon? -[exhales]
I'm… kind of freaking out.
Yeah, it's, um…
it's extremely surreal.
I'm gonna miss him so much.
I know Frankie's nervous.
So I'm trying really hard to be brave. But he's my favorite person.
translation.zh: 所以我在很努力地坚强起来但他是我最喜欢的人

translation.en: -That's the problem. [sniffles] -[Cassie] Oh. Uh…
[sighs] Sorry.
-I'm a mess. -[glass clinking]
Come on, get 'em up. I'd like to make another toast.
translation.zh: 大家把酒杯再端起来 我要再致个辞

translation.en: -[marines exclaiming] -This one is to life, love,
and hunting down some goddamn Arabs, baby!
translation.zh: 敬干掉一些天杀的阿拉伯人！

translation.en: Really? Oh boy.
Yeah!
You got a problem with that?
Yeah, you.
[laughs] It's just--
Arab is an ethnicity, and you're making it sound
translation.zh: 阿拉伯人是一个种族你这样说就好像

translation.en: like you're hunting down everyone of a certain ethnicity.
-Which sounds kind of problematic. -[Frankie] Yeah, Cassie.
translation.zh: -这听起来有点问题-好了 卡茜

translation.en: He gets it. He's just stirring the pot.
translation.zh: 他明白 他只是在提振士气

translation.en: Thank you for the sensitivity training. All right?
I'm out here serving my country. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 我要为国出征了 你这是什么意思？

translation.en: I don't know. Apparently, I'm telling a marine
translation.zh: 我不知道显然我在告诉一个海军陆战队的士兵

translation.en: he shouldn't be hunting down Arabs.
translation.zh: 不该干掉所有阿拉伯人

translation.en: -Okay. No, no. -[woman] Let it go.
And what exactly would you like us to do, huh?
translation.zh: 那你究竟想要我们做什么？

translation.en: Go over there and teach them pronouns?
How about starting with knowing who your actual enemy is,
translation.zh: 你先了解下你真正的敌人是谁

translation.en: and not making disturbing generalizations. How about that?
translation.zh: 而不是瞎说一通惹人烦 怎么样？

translation.en: You watch your tone. Luke, get your girl.
translation.zh: 注意你的语气 卢克 管好你老婆

translation.en: -[woman] Stop. -Excuse me?
-He doesn't "get" me. -[Frankie] Yeah, he does.
That's enough! Both of you.
Sit down.
[marine 1] Do what the man says.
Now.
-[marine 1] Thank you. -[Luke] You too, man.
[sighs] God, I just love nuanced conversations like these.
translation.zh: 天哪 我真的好喜欢这种微妙的对话

translation.en: I should go check on my husband.
-[marine 3] What the hell? -Oh, man. Those two are fiery.
translation.zh: 天哪 这两人都挺暴躁

translation.en: -You're this mad, really? -[Luke] Yeah.
You know what he meant.
Okay, it's all bullshit bravado.
And look, Armando is a dick.
translation.zh: 听着 阿曼多是个混蛋

translation.en: But I… I don't think you understand what we're preparing ourselves to go and do.
translation.zh: 但我觉得你不明白我们是为了即将面对的事打气

translation.en: Is it really worth ruining everybody's night for?
translation.zh: 真的值得毁了每个人的夜晚吗？

translation.en: I'm sure I wasn't the one who ruined the night.
translation.zh: 我敢肯定不是我破坏了今晚

translation.en: I'm sure it was your friend shouting, "Kill all Arabs."
translation.zh: 我肯定是你朋友大喊“杀了所有阿拉伯人” 毁了今晚

translation.en: What, 'cause you were gonna have the best night if he didn't say that?
translation.zh: 如果他不这么说你今晚就会过得开心吗？

translation.en: Sitting at a table full of people you feel superior to.
translation.zh: 和满是你觉得低你一等的人吃饭

translation.en: Not being a racist troll is kinda superior though, isn't it?
translation.zh: 不做种族主义巨魔确实会让我有优越感 不是吗？

translation.en: Okay, yeah, but without guys like Armando,
translation.zh: 是 但没有阿曼多这样的人

translation.en: do you really think this country would be safe from terrorists?
translation.zh: 你认为这个国家会免受恐怖分子的侵害吗？

translation.en: No, look, and you preach, "The future is female."
translation.zh: 不会 你宣扬“未来属于女性”

translation.en: How do you think those women feel in Iraq?
translation.zh: 那你觉得伊拉克的女性境遇如何？

translation.en: You live in this bubble.
-I can't stand it. -No, you're right.
Because the obvious solution is guns. Send over a bunch of men with guns!
translation.zh: 因为明显的解决办法是用枪派一群人拿枪去干仗！

translation.en: [marine 2] Wow, they're off to a great start.
translation.zh: 哇 他们这婚姻有个好的开头

translation.en: -Perfect. Guns. What? -They see us. Come here.
translation.zh: -好 用枪 怎么了？-他们能看到我们 过来

translation.en: -I said they can see us, come here. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我说他们能看见我们 过来-好

translation.en: -Yeah, well, couples fight, dude-- -You are so goddamn stubborn, just…
translation.zh: -这只是情侣拌嘴 伙计…-你真是固执 赶紧…

translation.en: Working through our differences.
-Okay? -[sighs]
-Still looking. -[Cassie] Mm-hmm.
[Luke] Yeah.
-[inhales deeply] -[Luke] Keep holding me.
So in love.
[woman] See? They're hugging. [marine 2] They're fine now.
We're good.
[softly] Yep.
Good.
-[woman] Last night, baby! -[marines laughing]
[marine 2] Ah, make it count, fellas!
-[woman] Let's go big tonight! -[marine 2] In bed! Whoo!
[Frankie] I love you, girl!
[Frankie laughs] Giddy up! Giddy up! Come on!
-[woman] Good night. -Night.
translation.zh: 晚安 -晚安-在蜜月套房玩得开心！

translation.en: [Armando] Have fun in the honeymoon suite!
-[Luke chuckles] -Nice one.
-Huh. I… I asked for two beds. -Mm-hmm.
Sure.
Sure you did.
All right, 'cause, what? Y-You think I'm into you?
translation.zh: 好吧 怎样？你以为我喜欢你吗？

translation.en: [Cassie] Maybe a little.
-Just breathe, dude. -[exhales] Well, 'cause I'm not.
translation.zh: -放轻松 伙计-我放松不了

translation.en: -All I know is you're a hot mess. -What is that supposed to mean?
translation.zh: -我只知道你一团糟-这是什么意思？

translation.en: I don't know, because a normal person would just admit that they're scared.
translation.zh: 我不知道因为正常人会承认自己害怕

translation.en: I'm not scared. I'm not scared.
[Cassie] Okay. Well then, what's with the tough guy act?
translation.zh: 好 那为什么要装硬汉？

translation.en: You're bossing me around, telling me to sit down. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 你对我发号施令 叫我坐下

translation.en: [Luke] Please, stop.
[Cassie] I can't do this. I'm not doing this. Big mistake.
translation.zh: 我做不到 还是别吵了跟你结婚是个天大的错误

translation.en: [Luke breathing deeply] You're right.
I'm scared.
[sighs] Between the marriage and Iraq,
translation.zh: 假结婚和去伊拉克的事情

translation.en: I'm kind of losing it.
I'm sorry.
Hey, you'd be absolutely crazy if you weren't.
translation.zh: 嘿 你要是不害怕才是真的疯了

translation.en: That was really brave.
I should wash up.
Cassie…
Is this okay?
Yes.
-How long have you been up? -Since 3:00 a.m.
translation.zh: -你起来多久了？-三点就起来了

translation.en: I went for a run.
[chuckles] You went for a run at three in the morning?
-I couldn't sleep. -[Cassie] What?
translation.zh: 我睡不着 -什么？-你听到了 我完全睡不着

translation.en: [Luke] You heard me. I… I couldn't sleep at all.
translation.zh: -什么？-你听到了 我完全睡不着

translation.en: So, I went for a run. That's what I do.
translation.zh: 所以我去跑步了 我就是这样

translation.en: So, you're that guy?
translation.zh: 你是那种男人 是吧？

translation.en: Pretend-it-didn't-happen guy.
I don't know what you want from me. I just have a lot on my mind.
translation.zh: 我不知道你想让我怎样我脑子里事情很多

translation.en: -Okay. -[Luke] We've gotta go to deployment.
So I'll take you to base.
Great.
I've lived in Oceanside my whole life, and I've never been on base.
translation.zh: 我一辈子都住在欧申赛德却从来没有去过基地

translation.en: Hey, I love you, man.
I gotta go.
Hey, Cassie, anything happens to me, you're my next of kin, okay?
translation.zh: 卡茜 如果我遭遇不测你就是我的直系亲属 懂吗？

translation.en: You can call my brother. Tell him about our deal.
translation.zh: 你可以打给我哥哥把我们的约定告诉他

translation.en: You'll have to make up a story for my dad.
But please, my dad cannot know about this. All right?
translation.zh: 但我爸千万不能知道这件事 好吗？

translation.en: Okay.
[marine 1] Lance Corporal Morrow, congratulations.
translation.zh: 莫罗准下士 新婚快乐

translation.en: Remember, from here on out, we're being watched, all right?
translation.zh: 记住 从现在开始我们会被人监视 好吗？

translation.en: Emails, video calls, everything.
translation.zh: 电子邮件、视频通话 所有的一切

translation.en: -NCOs, move those men. Let's go! -[engine starts]
translation.zh: 各位士官 集结士兵 出发！

translation.en: Hey guys, one more time for the newlyweds!
translation.zh: 各位 再为这对新婚夫妇庆祝一次！

translation.en: Hey! Come here, girl! [marine 2] Let's get her. Let's get her.
translation.zh: 嘿！过来 姑娘！ 我们去抓她

translation.en: -[Armando] Come on, one last one. -[marines grunting]
-[marine 3] Pick her up. -[marines cheering]
-[Frankie] Here we go. -[marine 1 laughing]
[Frankie] There we go.
[marine 2] Come get your bride!
translation.zh: -嘿 快点！-快来领你的新娘！

translation.en: [Luke] I'm sorry.
[chanting] Kiss! Kiss! Kiss! Kiss! Kiss! Kiss! Kiss! Kiss!
-[Armando] Come on, get in there, Luke. -[chanting] Kiss! Kiss!
translation.zh: -快点 亲啊 卢克-亲一个

translation.en: [Armando] That's your last one for a long time.
[marine 3 laughing] Okay.
[marine 4] All right, love birds. Let's go.
translation.zh: 好了 神仙眷侣 走了 快走吧

translation.en: Take care of yourself, okay?
translation.zh: 照顾好你自己 好吗？

translation.en: [Frankie] I want a hit record when I come back, all right?
translation.zh: 等我回来 我要看到你的热销唱片

translation.en: -Yep. -Just for you.
Bravo Company, on the bus! Let's move!
translation.zh: 陆战队士兵 快上车！快点

translation.en: [woman] Congratulations.
Thanks.
This doesn't even feel real.
Dear Luke.
We fell in love so quickly.
I figured I'd write you and fill in the gaps
translation.zh: 所以我想该写信给你 填补那些

translation.en: that we didn't have time to fill.
translation.zh: 我们没有时间填补的空白

translation.en: So… [chuckles]
Here's what you need to know about me.
translation.zh: 关于我 你需要知道以下这些事

translation.en: ♪ Hoping… ♪
Music is…
♪ Come back home… ♪
…my everything.
♪ Come back home ♪
♪ Come back home ♪
I started as a kid just singing to myself to drown out what was going on at home.
translation.zh: 最初 我幼年时只是自说自唱以消弭家里的烦恼

translation.en: My mom had a string of boyfriends from the base
translation.zh: 我妈妈有很多当兵的男朋友

translation.en: who did nothing but make her miserable.
translation.zh: 他们只留给她无尽的痛苦

translation.en: We didn't talk about it. She, uh… She thought I didn't notice, but I did.
translation.zh: 我们没谈过这些事她以为我不知道 但其实 我都知道

translation.en: So while most people learn to speak their feelings out loud
translation.zh: 大多数人都会学着说出自己的感受

translation.en: or write them into a journal, I learned to make mine into music.
translation.zh: 或者写进日记里而我则学着做成音乐

translation.en: My whole life, I've loved to sing,
but I'm kind of terrified to sing what I have to say.
translation.zh: 但我有点害怕唱出自己要说的话

translation.en: -[nurse] …feel a squeeze. -[clicks]
So I sing covers. I hide behind someone else's words instead.
translation.zh: 所以我只是翻唱躲在别人的歌词后面

translation.en: Ironic since I have been told I'm more than opinionated.
translation.zh: 这很讽刺 因为有人告诉我我不仅仅是固执己见

translation.en: It's just every time I sit down to write something original,
translation.zh: 只是每次我坐下来写一些原创的歌曲

translation.en: making a living and all my medical problems get in the way.
translation.zh: 谋求生存我的各种医疗问题就会妨碍我

translation.en: Maybe that's a cop-out, but I guess now that we're married,
translation.zh: 或许那是个借口但我想既然现在我们结婚了

translation.en: I'll find out.
[Luke] Dear Cassie, here's what you should know about me.
translation.zh: 亲爱的卡茜 关于我 你应该知道以下这些事

translation.en: I'm a third-generation marine.
translation.zh: 我是家中第三代海军陆战队队员

translation.en: My grandpa fought in the battle of Iwo Jima,
translation.zh: 我爷爷参加了硫磺岛战役

translation.en: and my dad got a Purple Heart
translation.zh: 爸爸在沙漠风暴行动中受伤

translation.en: for being injured in combat in Desert Storm.
After high school, I kind of spun out.
translation.zh: 高中毕业后 我有点失去控制

translation.en: I thought that by enlisting, I could earn back my dad's respect.
translation.zh: 我以为入伍就能赢回爸爸的尊重

translation.en: But now, that I'm actually here,
I'm starting to understand I'm not doing it for him.
translation.zh: 我开始明白 我这样做不是为了他

translation.en: I'm doing it for me.
To serve my country and to, uh, be a better man.
translation.zh: 是为了为国效力 成为更好的人

translation.en: Hey, Luke, it's your boy, Johnno. I got last week's deposit.
translation.zh: 嘿 卢克 我是你的兄弟约翰诺我拿到了上周的钱

translation.en: Keep faking that marriage. That shit's crazy. [laughs]
translation.zh: 继续维持假结婚吧 真是太棒了

translation.en: Anyway, get me this week's. Keep 'em coming.
translation.zh: 总之 把这周的钱给我 别停哦

translation.en: [Luke] You know those freak thunderstorms they get by the beach?
translation.zh: 你知道海滩边的那些怪异雷暴吗？

translation.en: -They used to scare the shit out of me. -[Cassie humming]
My dad was a hard-ass about it,
but I remember once, he let my brother and me
translation.zh: 但我记得有一次 他让我和我哥

translation.en: bring our sleeping bags in and crash on the floor.
translation.zh: 带着睡袋进来 在地板上睡觉

translation.en: Our family like that, all together, when it was storming out,
translation.zh: 所以风暴来临的时候我们全家都聚在一起

translation.en: it's one of my best memories.
translation.zh: 这是我最美好的回忆之一

translation.en: Not long after that, my mom got sick,
translation.zh: 不久之后 我妈便生病了

translation.en: and my dad retired from the Corps to take care of her.
He went to every single one of her chemo appointments.
Sat up all night by her bed when she went to the hospital at the end.
translation.zh: 最后在医院的时候在她的床边坐了一夜

translation.en: Hmm. That's what love means to me.
I guess that's what I want for us.
translation.zh: 我想我也希望我们拥有这样的爱情

translation.en: [Cassie] My dear husband.
Car ride over plane ride.
Breakfast tacos over late-night tacos, with lots of hot sauce.
translation.zh: 早餐玉米饼胜过深夜加了很多辣酱的玉米饼

translation.en: Lots of it.
I've never left California, but my dream is to circle the globe
translation.zh: 我从来没有离开过加州 但我的梦想 是有一天和我的乐队一起环游世界

translation.en: with my band someday.
translation.zh: 是有一天和我的乐队一起环游世界

translation.en: If I were home more, I'd have a pet iguana.
translation.zh: 如果我在家时间更多一些我会养一只鬣蜥当宠物

translation.en: Shut up. They're highly intelligent.
translation.zh: 不许笑我 它们很聪明的

translation.en: [Luke] My darling wife.
Nothing ruins a taco more than hot sauce. It totally kills the flavor.
translation.zh: 没有什么比辣酱更能毁掉玉米饼那样完全破坏了味道

translation.en: Someday I'm going to run a marathon in every major city.
translation.zh: 总有一天我会在每个大城市都跑一次马拉松

translation.en: That's how I'm going to see the world.
And I don't mean to burst your bubble, but an iguana isn't in the cards for us.
translation.zh: 我不想让你失望但鬣蜥不在考虑之列

translation.en: The only pet I've ever had was a goldfish I won at the state fair.
translation.zh: 我唯一养过的宠物是我在州博览会上赢得的一条金鱼

translation.en: Hey, can you, uh…
-Can you see me? -[Cassie] Yeah. Uh, can you see me?
translation.zh: -你能看见我吗？-能 你能看到我吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah. Yeah.
Hi.
[Luke] Hi.
Oh, your, uh, your best friend is here.
-You remember my wife? -[Armando] Yeah.
I remember. The love birds.
Hi!
-Riley says, "What's up?" -[Cassie] Hi, Riley.
translation.zh: -嘿 莱莉向你问好-嗨 莱莉

translation.en: -Hey, Cassie. -How is it?
Uh, you know, I got sand in my butt crack, so.
translation.zh: 我屁股沟子里全是沙子

translation.en: Sounds fantastic.
So, how was your day, babe?
translation.zh: 你今天过得怎么样 宝贝？

translation.en: Uh, it was fine.
Babe.
I, um…
[smacks lips] I worked,
and I started to write a song.
Wait, you just wrote a song? Like, just like that?
translation.zh: 等等 你写了一首歌？这么厉害吗？

translation.en: -Hey, Cassie, play it for us! -Play it for us!
translation.zh: -嘿 卡茜 唱给我们听！-我说不好…

translation.en: [marines] Play it! Play it!
-Play it! -[laughs]
-Play it! Play it! -Come on!
I mean, it's not… it's not finished.
Play it for us!
-Please. -[Frankie] Come on!
Look, I'm hoping the song will be finished in, like, a week.
translation.zh: 听着 这首歌应该可以 一周后完成

translation.en: Come on.
-[marine] Okay, okay. -[chuckles]
I promise. Guys, I promise I'll sing it for you guys then.
translation.zh: 我保证 各位 我保证到时会唱给你们

translation.en: [smacks lips] All right, well, one week. You know where to find us.
translation.zh: 好吧 那就一周 你知道我们在哪

translation.en: Hey, we should go, fellas. Chow time!
translation.zh: 嘿 我们该走了 伙计们 开饭！

translation.en: By all means, chow.
Love you, Cass!
I, uh…
I love you.
Yeah, ditto.
I love you, too.
[marine 1] Love you.
-[marine2] Love you. -Love you.
-[Armando] Love you. -[Frankie] I love you too.
-[marine 2] You love her? [laughs] -[Armando] I love you!
♪ You know where to find us ♪
♪ Return home ♪
♪ You know where to find ♪
♪ Come back home ♪
[man] We should try that after the chorus. [Nora] Yeah.
translation.zh: -我们应该在合唱之后加上这个-对

translation.en: ♪ Come back home ♪
-[woman] Think it's right? -[Cassie] Do that on bass, Max.
translation.zh: -你觉得这样行吗？-用贝斯弹 麦克斯

translation.en: It's freaking awesome.
[Cassie] ♪ I want you to come back home ♪
-[Nora] Sounded good. -[Cassie] We have a song!
-Yes! -[all clapping]
-Hi. -[siren sounding]
Hey.
Are you okay?
[Luke] Yeah, it's just chaos.
translation.zh: 没事 就是一团混乱

translation.en: We nearly lost one of the guys today. He just got airlifted out.
translation.zh: 我们今天差点失去一位战友他刚被空运出战场

translation.en: [Cassie] Oh my God.
Um, Frankie's here.
Frankie, say hi.
What up, Cass?
-Hi. -[Frankie] Hey, uh…
We could all use that serenade.
translation.zh: 我们挺需要听听你那首曲子

translation.en: Today was pretty ugly.
Everyone's just trying to call their family.
translation.zh: 大家都在给家人打电话

translation.en: [Cassie] God. How do we not hear about these things here?
translation.zh: 天哪 为什么国内不知道这些事？

translation.en: [Frankie] Right, fellas?
A little serenade from Luke's wife? Yeah?
translation.zh: 听卢克妻子创作的小曲？好吗？

translation.en: You did promise.
Okay. Okay. I know… I know I promised,
and it's… it's finally ready.
I think it's ready?
I've never really played my own songs for anyone yet.
translation.zh: 我从未在别人面前演奏过我自己写的歌

translation.en: So, go easy on me.
This goes out to all you American heroes.
translation.zh: 这是一首献给所有美国英雄的歌

translation.en: A brand-new song.
♪ We are drowning in our eyes ♪
♪ Don't know what we'll find ♪
♪ Not sure should we fly or fight this ♪
translation.zh: 不知该振翅逃离还是勇敢抗争

translation.en: ♪ We are terrified ♪
♪ Pretending that we don't care ♪
♪ But tension cuts Cuts the air ♪
♪ We're more than scared ♪
♪ I'm drowning in your eyes ♪
♪ I am terrified ♪
-♪ Letting my fears show ♪ -[chopper hovering]
♪ Until I can face them ♪
♪ Letting my tears go ♪
-♪ Until I can taste them ♪ -[chopper hovering]
♪ Hell, what do I know ♪
♪ Where you and I'll go ♪
♪ But dammit I hope you ♪
♪ Come back home ♪
-[marine 1] Yeah! -[all applauding]
[marine 2] That's what I'm talking about!
-Hey, that's my wife. [chuckles] -[marine 3] Whoo!
Thank you.
Seriously.
I think we needed that.
Be safe out there, guys.
What's happening with the demo?
I posted it, and
I sent it to, like, a dozen small labels.
translation.zh: 发给十几家小唱片公司

translation.en: -Okay. They're gonna love it. -[Cassie] Actually…
this, um, indie music site did a review of one of our last gigs
translation.zh: 有个独立音乐网站对我们上一场演出

translation.en: that was just, like, insanely positive, and I guess this booker read it.
translation.zh: 做出了极度的好评然后一个经纪人读到了这个评论

translation.en: And now, we have a slot at the Oceanside Alt-Fest.
translation.zh: 现在我们要在欧申赛德艺术节上演出了

translation.en: What?
Like, the Oceanside Alt-Fest!
translation.zh: 大名鼎鼎的欧申赛德艺术节！

translation.en: That's crazy! You… You're doing the damn thing.
Wait, so does this mean that I'm, like, your muse? No?
translation.zh: 等等 这是不是表示我是你的缪斯？ -你知道吗？-真的？

translation.en: Really? Let me think about it.
translation.zh: -你知道吗？-真的？ 让我考虑一下

translation.en: Okay, maybe just a little.
Good luck at the concert. Bye.
translation.zh: 祝你演唱会顺利 再见

translation.en: -[reporter speaking indistinctly] -[guns firing]
[announcer] Oceanside Alt-Fest fans,
translation.zh: 欧申赛德艺术节的各位粉丝

translation.en: the musical lineup will be starting on the main stage in just a moment.
translation.zh: 这个音乐组合马上就要登上主舞台了

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, put your hands together
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们 请举起你们的双手

translation.en: for Oceanside's very own Cassie Salazar and The Loyal.
translation.zh: 有请欧申赛德自己的 卡茜·萨拉扎和忠诚乐队

translation.en: -How we feeling, Oceanside? -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: 欧申赛德的各位 大家好吗？

translation.en: Oh my God!
God! This is unreal.
-Hi! -Whoo!
To all the brave men and women who are serving our country
translation.zh: 献给所有在世界另一端为国效力

translation.en: on the other side of the world.
Thank you.
[sergeant] Get hold of your gear. Make sure you have your magazines loaded.
translation.zh: 检查装备 确保弹夹数量齐全

translation.en: -Make sure your gear is prepped. -[blowing]
[sergeant] Tomorrow we're going on patrol.
And I want everything ready for tomorrow. Everybody understands?
translation.zh: 我希望明天一切都准备好大家都明白吗？

translation.en: [marines] Yes, sir.
[sergeant] All of ya, I need your head on a swivel tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我需要你们明天保持警惕

translation.en: -No messing around. -[blowing]
Luke, I tried you three times. What's going on?
translation.zh: 卢克 我给你打了三次电话了怎么回事？

translation.en: [on voicemail] You have reached Luke. Leave a message.
Okay. Uh…
Hi. So I posted one of the tracks from my Oceanside Alt-Fest show,
translation.zh: 嗨 我在声田上发布了欧申赛德音乐节演出中的一首曲目

translation.en: the one that I played for you on Spotify,
translation.zh: 就是我为你演奏的那首

translation.en: and it got picked up for the Road Trip playlist,
translation.zh: 这首歌被收录到了最佳公路旅行播放列表

translation.en: and now it has over 200,000 plays.
translation.zh: 现在已经有超过20万次的播放

translation.en: Luke, the song you may or may not have influenced has literally gone viral.
translation.zh: 卢克 这首可能受你影响的歌现在真的爆火了

translation.en: That's it. Bye, muse.
translation.zh: 就这样 拜拜 缪斯

translation.en: -[man] Whoo! Yeah! -Hi, sir!
-[man] Lovely day, right? -[Cassie] Yeah.
It's a great day today!
-[man] God bless you! -God bless you!
translation.zh: -愿上帝保佑你！-愿上帝保佑你！

translation.en: [laughing] You guys know the words.
Billy, we want a Friday night slot. You think we can get that now?
translation.zh: 我们想要周五晚上的演出时段能给我们吗？

translation.en: [chanting] Billy! Billy!
[crowd chanting] Billy! Billy! Billy! Billy! Billy! Billy! Billy!
-[Cassie] Yeah! -[crowd cheering]
-[Nora] To The Loyal. -[laughing]
[Nora] We are so famous. -[Cassie] Eddie? -[Eddie yelling]
Oh my God, Cass, your phone is blowing up.
translation.zh: 天哪 卡茜 你的手机都要炸了

translation.en: -[Cassie] What? -[Nora] Of course it is. [laughs]
[Cassie] Germany?
[woman 1] This is amazing, you guys.
Sorry, guys, I gotta take this.
translation.zh: 抱歉 各位 我得接下这个电话

translation.en: -[Nora] Who is it? -[Cassie] Don't know.
-Just like five minutes, okay? -Better be a record deal.
translation.zh: -就五分钟 好吗？-最好是唱片公司

translation.en: Hello?
[man on phone] Yes. Is this Casandra Salazar?
translation.zh: 你是卡珊德拉·萨拉扎吗？

translation.en: [Cassie] Yes.
[on phone] Yes, ma'am, this is Captain Curtis,
translation.zh: 女士 我是柯蒂斯上尉

translation.en: Rear Detachment Commander for the 1st Battalion, 1st Marines.
translation.zh: 海军陆战第一师第一营的后方支队指挥官

translation.en: Ma'am, I'm calling because your husband has been wounded in action.
translation.zh: 女士 我打电话是因为你丈夫在一次行动中受伤

translation.en: He's going to be transferred from Germany
to the Naval Medical Center in San Diego.
translation.zh: 转到圣地亚哥的海军医疗中心

translation.en: Is he okay?
[Captain Curtis] His legs were injured during an IED detonation.
translation.zh: 他的双腿被简易爆炸装置炸伤

translation.en: He's currently undergoing surgery. [softly] No, this isn't happening.
Sorry, but I'm having a hard time understanding you.
translation.zh: 抱歉 但我真的听不清你在说什么

translation.en: Shit!
Jacob Morrow.
[sighs] Jacob Morrow.
Luke's brother, I'll find you.
translation.zh: 卢克的哥哥 我会找到你

translation.en: Can I help you?
-I'm looking for Jacob Morrow. -[Jacob] You found him.
translation.zh: -我找雅各布·莫罗-这就是他家

translation.en: Is Luke's brother here by any chance? It's important.
translation.zh: 卢克的哥哥在吗？我有急事

translation.en: I'm Luke's father. What's he done? What's he done now?
translation.zh: 我是卢克的父亲 他做了什么？

translation.en: -I really need to talk to his brother. -Stop.
translation.zh: -我真的需要跟他哥哥谈谈-别说了

translation.en: Cut the shit. What do you want?
translation.zh: 别废话了 你想怎样？

translation.en: Is Luke in jail? He owe you money? What?
translation.zh: 卢克进监狱了吗？还是欠你钱？到底什么事？

translation.en: Luke was wounded in combat.
Sir. He's in Iraq.
-Or he was in Iraq. -Wh--
translation.zh: -或者说他之前在伊拉克-什么…

translation.en: -He deployed a couple of months ago. -Hang on.
translation.zh: -他几个月前被派遣到国外-等下

translation.en: I didn't even know he had enlisted.
-How bad is he? -[Cassie] I haven't seen him.
translation.zh: -情况有多严重？-我还没见到他

translation.en: The Marines called me last night, and they said that…
translation.zh: 海军陆战队昨晚给我打电话

translation.en: …that his legs had been shattered, uh, by some kind of IED.
translation.zh: 他们说他的腿被某种简易爆炸装置炸断了

translation.en: [whispers] Ah, Jesus.
[Cassie] And that he would be here
in a couple of days. [sighs]
-I'm so sorry. -Why'd they call you?
translation.zh: -我真的很遗憾-军队为什么打给你？

translation.en: I'm his wife.
Surprise.
I'm sorry, come on in.
[man] Lance Corporal Morrow?
Back to U.S. soil. You look a little dizzy.
translation.zh: 欢迎回国 你好像有点晕

translation.en: Lance Corporal Morrow?
[doctor] So, your skin grafts were successful,
but I'm gonna keep you on this wound vac for a week to help you heal.
translation.zh: 但我会继续进行负压伤口治疗帮你恢复

translation.en: Right now, your family's here.
You lean on them, you'll be on the mend before you know it.
translation.zh: 依靠家人 你很快就能恢复

translation.en: [man] Right over here.
Luke.
Dad?
Oh my God. Jeez, man, we could have lost you.
translation.zh: 天哪 我们差点失去你

translation.en: You could've told us you got married. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 怎么不告诉我们你结婚了？

translation.en: Yeah, congratulations.
-Thanks. -Thanks.
Hi.
-Hi, babe. -Hi.
I'm… I'm so sorry, honey.
I never thought I'd see you in the Corps. [chuckles]
I hear you're getting a Purple Heart.
translation.zh: 我听说你要荣获紫心勋章

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Jacob] That's an honor.
You told Jake not to tell me you enlisted.
translation.zh: 你入伍的事 你告诉杰克瞒着我

translation.en: Why? Why did you have to lie to me again?
translation.zh: 为什么？你为什么又要骗我？

translation.en: You'd have said I didn't think it through.
translation.zh: 你会说我没有考虑清楚

translation.en: I hope to get the chance to prove you wrong.
translation.zh: 我希望有机会能证明你是错的

translation.en: Yeah, me too.
So, how we doing? Give me the rundown, Doctor.
translation.zh: 情况如何？跟我们说说吧 医生

translation.en: Look, this is going to be a long rehab, and he's starting from zero.
translation.zh: 康复过程会很漫长而且他也没有经验

translation.en: -Doctor, will he be able to run again? -It's combat medicine, you know. [sighs]
translation.zh: -医生 他以后还能跑步吗？-是因为我的药

translation.en: Let's get you walking first. Then we can talk about running.
translation.zh: 先恢复走路 再说能不能跑

translation.en: Thank you.
Well, your mom would, uh…
Your mother would've been heartbroken to see you like this.
translation.zh: 你母亲看到你这副模样一定会很心疼

translation.en: Hey. Let's give them a minute.
translation.zh: 嘿 让他们独处一会吧

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Thanks.
-[Luke sighs loudly] -[smacks lips] I, uh…
I went to the wrong Jacob Morrow.
I'm so sorry. I… I was just scared for you--
translation.zh: 对不起 我当时吓坏了我不知道该怎么做 我…

translation.en: You've got to be kidding me, Cassie.
[sighs] What were you thinking? We are totally screwed.
translation.zh: 你怎么想的？我们完蛋了

translation.en: I told you he was Military Police.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过 他是军警

translation.en: You failed to mention your dad and your brother have the same frickin' name, Luke.
translation.zh: 你没说你爸爸和你哥哥同名 卢克

translation.en: -It's fine. It's fine. -[Luke] It's not fine. [sighs]
We'll just get a divorce, and you'll never have to see me again.
translation.zh: 我们只要离婚你就再也不会见到我了

translation.en: No, no, no, he doesn't trust me already. He's already watching us.
translation.zh: 不 他已经不相信我了他已经盯上我们了

translation.en: -No, he won't turn in his own son. -You have no idea.
translation.zh: -不 他不会举报自己的儿子-你想得太简单了

translation.en: Even though he's retired, he still acts like a cop.
translation.zh: 就算退休了 他还是个警察的样子

translation.en: Gotta keep it together. A couple months until I get back on my feet.
translation.zh: 我们要保持冷静 坚持几个月直到我好转

translation.en: [sighs] We'll live together just till I'm done with supervised PT.
translation.zh: 我们要住在一起直到我完成受人监管的理疗

translation.en: W-We'll be off the radar. All right?
Until then, we have to make them believe this is a real marriage.
translation.zh: 但在那之前我们必须让他们相信这是真正的婚姻

translation.en: -Luke, a couple of months? -[sighs]
-What… What does that mean exactly? -We act like married people.
translation.zh: -我不…那是什么意思？-我们表现得像已婚夫妻

translation.en: Pretend.
All right? You can do that. You can do that.
Pretend, all right?
-It's gonna be fine. -[Cassie] It is. We're gonna play house.
translation.zh: -不会有事的-是的 我们要玩过家家了

translation.en: Is Frankie gonna laugh or cry when he finds out about this?

translation.en: Shit.
What?
-No one told you? -What?
Frankie, he's, um…
The same mission as this. He, uh…
He didn't make it, Cassie.

translation.en: No.
I'm sorry, I--
I can't be here.
[reporter] Local Oceanside resident Frankie Mubuthia has been killed in the line of duty.
translation.zh: 欧申赛德当地居民弗兰基·穆布蒂亚在执行任务时牺牲

translation.en: He was 20 years old.
His family says that they are proud of his heroism and sacrifice
translation.zh: 他的家人为其英雄事迹和为自由作出的牺牲

translation.en: in the name of freedom.
His funeral will be held at Fort Rosecrans in San Diego.
translation.zh: 他的葬礼将在圣地亚哥的罗斯克兰斯堡举行

translation.en: -[rifle salute leader] Aim. Fire. -[rifles fire]
Aim.
-[Cassie] Hi. -[inhales deeply]
[Cassie] The service was beautiful.
[exhales] Frankie bought this for you.
He was waiting to propose until he came home,
translation.zh: 他想等他回家再跟你求婚

translation.en: and he asked me to keep it safe.
But I know that he really would have wanted me to give this to you.
translation.zh: 但我知道他一定会希望我把它交给你

translation.en: [Cassie] It fits you perfectly.
He loved you so much.
-What's he doing here? -I have no idea.
Lance Corporal Morrow, congratulations.

translation.en: Sounds like y'all are headed home. Y'all live near the base?
translation.zh: 听起来你们要回家了你们住在基地附近吗？

translation.en: It all happened so fast we didn't really get a chance--
translation.zh: 事情发生得太快了 我们还没有…

translation.en: -We didn't really live together. Yeah. -[Luke] Yeah.
Oh boy. Well, you will now.
translation.zh: 天哪 现在你们可以同居了

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah. [chuckles]
[Jacob] Yeah.
I'll be taking care of you. [chuckles]
Cassie, listen. I'll swing by the house,
translation.zh: 卡茜 这样 我会到你家去接他

translation.en: pick Luke up, and take him to PT two times a week.

translation.en: -Oh-- Yeah. -Oh. No, you don't have to do that.
[Jacob] Come on. It'll be great to reconnect with my son.
translation.zh: 行了 我很想与儿子重新建立感情

translation.en: Hear all about your whirlwind romance.
-Wow. -You really, really don't have to do that.
I heard you the first time.
-[inhales deeply] Thank you. -[Jacob] Mm-hmm.
I'll see you soon.
[sighs] Good lord.
Nice and easy. Easy, buddy.
translation.zh: 慢慢来 慢点 伙计

translation.en: -Hold up for a second. -Is it okay?
Home sweet home, bro.
translation.zh: 你终于回家了 弟弟

translation.en: -You're living in a three-story walk-up. -[Jake] Is there an elevator?
translation.zh: -你们住在三层楼高的公寓？-有电梯吗？

translation.en: -[Cassie] Ah, nope. -[man] Lance Corporal Morrow. Here we go.

translation.en: I'm gonna get one step ahead of you.
[man] You're gonna need our help with the stairs for sure.

translation.en: [Cassie] Yep. We'll invite you in next time. Thank you all so much. Bye.
translation.zh: 对 我们下次再请你们进来太感谢了 再见

translation.en: You're a runner too, huh?
It's a glucose gel.
I have diabetes, remember? The reason we're married.
translation.zh: 我有糖尿病 记得吗？我们就是因为这个结的婚

translation.en: Oh, speaking off, our wedding night was memorable,

translation.en: but we gotta set some boundaries here.
[Luke] Got it.
I'll take the couch.
I think there's some leftover Thai food in the fridge.
translation.zh: 我想冰箱里有一些剩下的泰餐

translation.en: I can't guarantee that it won't kill you. Oh, and I should warn you I'm not gonna be cooking for you--
translation.zh: 我不能保证那个吃不死你但我不会为你做饭的

translation.en: -You're freaking out. -Oh, what? And you're not?
I mean, I've never even lived with a guy before.
translation.zh: 我没有跟别的男人同居过

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. I'm… I'm feeling super.
Stuck in a wheelchair three stories up.
translation.zh: 坐着轮椅 被困在三楼

translation.en: Well, is this what's happening? Right now? Like, we're just living together?
With your dad coming in and out of my apartment
translation.zh: 你爸爸还要走进我的公寓

translation.en: judging if I pass the wife test?
translation.zh: 看我是不是你真正的老婆？

translation.en: [scoffs] Because this isn't what we agreed to.
translation.zh: 因为我们之前不是这样说的

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry that my injury is inconveniencing you.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我的伤势给你带来不便

translation.en: -It must be so, so hard for you. -Don't put this on me, Luke.
translation.zh: -你一定很辛苦-别把矛盾转嫁到我身上 卢克

translation.en: You can't be happy about this.
translation.zh: 你对这件事也不高兴吧

translation.en: Like, am I really the person you want taking care of you right now?
translation.zh: 你真的希望我来照顾你吗？

translation.en: No, no, no, you are not taking care of me. Please, don't.
translation.zh: 不 你不是在照顾我 拜托你 不要

translation.en: -Well, you're living with me! -To avoid a court-martial!
translation.zh: -你都和我同居了！-是为了避开军事法庭！

translation.en: What don't you understand about that? You could be charged too.
translation.zh: 你有什么不明白的？你可能也会被起诉

translation.en: Jesus!
Let's just get through this.
Super.
Super.
[Luke] Jake just said that Dad's gonna be here in 20.
translation.zh: 杰克刚刚说我爸20分钟后就到

translation.en: Oh crap.
Wait. You're cornering my sheets?
translation.zh: 等等 你在折我床单的角？

translation.en: He's not gonna inspect our bed.
[Luke] You never know.
[Cassie] Okay, here. Unpack.
translation.zh: 好了 来 打开行李吧

translation.en: -Is there any other drawers? -Nope, that's it.
translation.zh: -还有其他抽屉吗？-没有 就这样

translation.en: I hate wrinkles, Cassie.
[Cassie] Well, I hate the way you say my name, Commando.
translation.zh: 我讨厌你喊我名字的口气 突击队员

translation.en: [Cassie gasps] He's here.
Here, quick. I made you a replacement ring.
translation.zh: 快点 我给你做了个新的

translation.en: -Do I need one, really? -[Luke] Really.
[Cassie] Where did you get this?
I made it out of this.
That'll do.
Okay, husband.
God, that word.
-Hi. -[Jake] How's it going?
-[Cassie] Good. -[Luke] Hey.
-Hey, bro. -[Jacob] Okay, let's see the place.
translation.zh: -嘿-弟弟 -看看这地方-你怎么样？

translation.en: [Luke] How you doing?
translation.zh: -看看这地方-你怎么样？ 很好

translation.en: -Hi, Dad. -[Jake] Wow.
This place got the Luke Morrow makeover.
translation.zh: 这地方被卢克·莫罗彻底改造了

translation.en: If the man doesn't see enough right angles, he unravels.
translation.zh: 如果家里不够规整 他会抓狂

translation.en: -I'm allowed one drawer. Just one. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 我就能用一个抽屉 就一个

translation.en: -He's just-- He's kidding. [laughs] -It's our home. [laughs]
-You ready? -Yeah.
-Let's do it. -Here you go, sweetie.
-Thanks, honey. -All right. Hang on.
translation.zh: -谢谢 亲爱的-没事 坐稳了

translation.en: -Don't drop him down the stairs, Dad. -[Jacob] Hey, he's a marine. He'll bounce.
translation.zh: -别把他从楼梯上摔下去 爸爸-他是个海军陆战队员 会很有韧性

translation.en: Good luck, Commando.
translation.zh: 祝你好运 突击队员

translation.en: -[Jacob] All right. -[Cassie] Got it? [straining] Yeah.
[Cassie] Bye.
-[pen clinking] -[Cassie] ♪ I hate… ♪
♪ I hate the way you… ♪
[man] Hi, everybody. Thanks for coming out.
translation.zh: 大家好 非常感谢各位前来

translation.en: I'd like you all to meet the newest artist
we're considering for our label, Cassie Salazar.
translation.zh: 给大家介绍有意纳入 我们唱片公司的最新艺人卡茜·萨拉扎

translation.en: -Let's go, Cass. -Okay, okay, okay.
It's not ready yet,
but there's a little something that I've been working on.
♪ I hate the way you say my name ♪
translation.zh: 我讨厌你叫我名字的语气

translation.en: ♪ I hate your picture-perfect lips ♪
♪ On mine ♪
♪ If I could, I'd cut the brakes ♪
translation.zh: 如果可以 我会让自己望而却步

translation.en: ♪ I hate that I can't help but stay ♪
translation.zh: 我讨厌自己忍不住陪你身边

translation.en: ♪ Oh my ♪
-[exhales, sighs] -[Cassie] ♪ And I hate the way ♪
♪ I say words that I laughed at before ♪
translation.zh: 说出以前嗤之以鼻的话语

translation.en: ♪ And I hate the way ♪
♪ My thoughts aren't mine Now they're yours ♪
♪ Look at what you've created ♪
♪ Something borderline sacred ♪
♪ I call it overrated ♪
♪ Go on and call me jaded ♪
♪ 'Cause I hate the way ♪
♪ I say words that I laughed at before ♪
translation.zh: 说出以前嗤之以鼻的话语

translation.en: -[Luke] Hello? -[Johnno on phone] Welcome home, soldier.
That's a sweet beach house you and your fake wife got.
translation.zh: 你和你假妻子住的海滨小屋真温馨

translation.en: Is that why you haven't been paying me?
translation.zh: 所以你才没有继续还我钱吗？

translation.en: 'Cause, uh, since you're married, technically your wife, she owes me now too.
translation.zh: 既然你已经结婚了那代表你妻子也欠我钱了

translation.en: [man] Yeah, Cass!
-Hi. -Hi.
[Luke] You're back early.
Yeah.
-Okay, well, I'm, uh… I'm almost done. -No rush.
[Cassie] Look at you. Doing so much better.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧你 恢复得好多了

translation.en: [exhales] Yeah.
Slowly, slowly.
-[Jake] Hold up, girl. -[dog barking, panting]
[Luke] Hey, Jake, you get a dog?
translation.zh: 嘿 杰克 你养狗了？

translation.en: [Jake] You crazy?
She's for you.
Her name is Peaches because she's from Georgia.
translation.zh: 它叫桃子因为它老家是盛产桃子的佐治亚州

translation.en: Peaches, hi!
Sit. [gasps]
Paw! Good girl! [laughing]
See? We got training and everything already done for you.
translation.zh: 看见没？我们都为你训练好了

translation.en: We read that dogs can be really helpful
translation.zh: 我们读到文章 狗狗对于像你这样

translation.en: for guys like you, healing from injuries like yours.
translation.zh: 恢复伤病的人很有帮助

translation.en: -Oh, really? -I read it.
-Then she texted me. -I don't need you plotting behind my back.
translation.zh: -然后她给我发了信息-不准在我背后密谋

translation.en: Well, too bad, because it's good for you.
translation.zh: 太可惜了 因为它对你有好处

translation.en: [sighs] Guys like me?
Guys like me. What? Like a cripple?
translation.zh: 什么是像我这样的人？瘸子？

translation.en: [exhales sharply] I don't need your pity.
translation.zh: 我不需要你们的怜悯好吧 随便你

translation.en: All right, have it your way! Listen, I know what's good for me.
translation.zh: 听着 我知道什么对我有好处

translation.en: I can make decisions for myself.
[Cassie] People don't say "cripple" anymore.
translation.zh: 现在都没人说“瘸子”这个词了

translation.en: You know, it's okay to accept help sometimes.
translation.zh: 有时候接受帮助也没关系

translation.en: What the hell, Luke?
-[Peaches whimpering] -[Cassie laughs] See? Peaches gets it.
translation.zh: 瞧见没？桃子都比你懂事

translation.en: -Fine, I'll take her. -[both laugh]
-[Cassie] Good girl, Peaches. Good girl. -[Jake] Good girl! [laughs]
translation.zh: -好狗狗 桃子-真是好狗狗！

translation.en: Luke? Hey, Peaches, where's Luke?
translation.zh: 卢克？嘿 桃子 卢克呢？

translation.en: Hello?
-Luke? -[whimpers]
Oh my God.
-You're walking. -Barely.
[groaning] Hurts like a bitch.
-You know, apparently, I'm a psychic. -Oh yeah?
Because though I would usually just get myself breakfast tacos.
translation.zh: 因为我一般只给自己买早餐塔可饼

translation.en: This morning I woke up, and I thought, "I wonder if Luke deserves one?"
translation.zh: 今早我醒来后 心想：“或许卢克表现好值得吃一个？”

translation.en: -Oh. One? -[Cassie] Oh, calm down.
I got way too many.
I even got our dog a taco. [kissing sounds]
translation.zh: 甚至给我们的狗狗也买了

translation.en: -Right, Peaches. Yeah. -[barks]
Did you fix the doorknob?
Thanks, I guess.
[Luke] You know you can let a guy help you and still be a feminist, right?
translation.zh: 你知道自己可以一边接受男人帮忙一边当女权主义者吧？

translation.en: [chuckles] I'd rather have a broken knob than have you lecture me on feminism.
translation.zh: 我宁愿手把断着也比你教育我女权好

translation.en: [Luke] Oh, okay, so you wanna live on an island of broken doorknobs?
translation.zh: 好 那你就宁愿住在破门把手的破家？

translation.en: Why don't you say, "Luke, you're wrong."
translation.zh: 你为什么不干脆说：“卢克 你错了”

translation.en: -"You don't understand me." -Luke, you're wrong.
translation.zh: -“你根本不了解我”-卢克 你错了

translation.en: -You don't understand me. -[Luke] I'm not.
Really? Well, I'm doing okay on my own.
Maybe I don't need the chaos of someone having my heart or whatever.
translation.zh: 或许我不需要别人掌控着我的心那种不受控制的感觉

translation.en: Oh no. No more tacos if you do that.
translation.zh: 你要是这样 就不许吃塔可饼了

translation.en: -Do what? [laughs] -"Hmm."
Just say the damn thing.
Okay. The same reason you and I wouldn't work. You don't believe in love.
translation.zh: 好 这和你我没能成的原因一样你不相信爱情

translation.en: Wow, I had no idea that Psych 101 was part of basic training.
translation.zh: 哇 我不知道基础训练还包含心理课程呢

translation.en: Well, you realize I'm a marine, right? So, the training is not exactly basic.
translation.zh: 你要知道 我是海军陆战队员所以接受的训练一点都不基础

translation.en: Oh yeah, I've seen the movies.
I've done my homework. I'm a proud military wife, after all.
translation.zh: 做过功课毕竟我现在是一名骄傲的军嫂

translation.en: [clears throat] You don't wanna date a guy that you actually like
translation.zh: 你不想跟真正喜欢的男人约会

translation.en: because that would mean, you know, you'd have to give up control
translation.zh: 因为那样就意味着你得失去控制权

translation.en: and let someone in.
Okay, yeah. Well, maybe having control issues just means that I'm being smart.
translation.zh: 对 或许我有控制问题这代表我很聪明

translation.en: So maybe you don't know what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 你不知道自己在说什么

translation.en: Mmm, that's fake news.
Because when it comes to control issues, I'm self-taught.
translation.zh: 因为在控制问题上 我可是自学成才

translation.en: You?
You seem so chill.
Listen, it's this, or I'm breaking six laws,
translation.zh: 听我说 要不是这样要不我会违反六项法律

translation.en: going 120 down the 405 with no pants on. So…
translation.zh: 光着屁股每小时开190公里在405号州际高速路上狂奔

translation.en: Metaphorically?
Hard to picture.
Not that I'm picturing it. [laughing]
Okay.
What kind of freak skips out on the Tapatío?
translation.zh: 什么样的怪胎会不放墨西哥辣椒酱？

translation.en: You know, you snowflakes are just-- You're so judgy.
translation.zh: 你们这些玻璃心真的…你真事儿多

translation.en: -Don't start this. -[laughs]
-Okay, control freak, you ready to let go? -[rattling]
translation.zh: 好 控制狂 你准备好接受挑战了吗？

translation.en: -Hell yeah. -[Cassie] Drive on the wild side?
-Bring it on. -[Cassie] Pants down?
-Are you ready for this? -[exhales] Yeah.
[exhales] Bring it on.
-[Cassie] Ready? -Yeah.
[Cassie] On three.
One. Two. Three.
[Cassie] Do you wanna spit it out?
[sucking] It's not spicy.
Oh my G--
Can't breathe.
No, I'm totally fine.
-I go-- -[Cassie] Spit it out!
-No! -You're gonna lose.
Okay, I can't. [spits]
-Victory is mine! [spits] -[Luke] Oh my God.
I'm bleeding from my eyes. I'm bleeding from--
translation.zh: 我的眼睛都要流血了 我要流血…

translation.en: Yes! [grunts]
I won. [clears throat] -You lost. -[Luke] I got something for you.
translation.zh: -我赢了 你输了-我有东西要给你

translation.en: It's in my back pocket. Gimme one second. Here it is, right there.
translation.zh: 在我的后兜里 等下 送给你

translation.en: -I'm in pain. I'm in so much pain. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 我好痛苦 太痛苦了

translation.en: -You are sweating. Here. -[breathing heavily]
-Thank you. [sighs] -Mm-hmm.
Why would anyone do that to themselves? I don't understand.
translation.zh: 为什么会有人这样对自己？我不明白

translation.en: -[exhales] You're sweating too. -No.
This isn't sweat. This is a glow.
translation.zh: 这不是出汗 我这是容光焕发

translation.en: Maybe we should watch a movie or something.
translation.zh: 或许我们该看个电影什么的

translation.en: [Cassie] I can smell the jalapeños coming out of your pores. So, uh…
translation.zh: 我可以闻到从你的毛孔中散发出的墨西哥辣椒味 所以…

translation.en: Maybe you take a shower first.
Getting in the shower means standing up for a long period of time,
translation.zh: 淋浴意味着要站立很久

translation.en: which means radiating pain.
Okay, then take a bath?
-It's gonna just make you feel better. -Getting in the tub is also a nightmare.
translation.zh: -这会让你感觉好些-进入浴缸也是个噩梦

translation.en: [Cassie] Here.
It's not pretty.
-[chuckles] I can do that myself. -Just let me.
[Cassie] I see how hard you've been working at it,
translation.zh: 我知道你为此付出了多少努力

translation.en: and you'll run again, Luke.
translation.zh: 你会再次跑起来的 卢克

translation.en: I believe in you.
Why don't you sleep in the bed tonight?
[Cassie] Hi, Peaches.
-Hi, good girl. -Hey, baby. Okay.
translation.zh: -嗨 好狗狗-嘿 宝贝 好了

translation.en: Yeah, you wanna go that way, all right. [groans]
[Luke] God, I haven't been back here in so long.
translation.zh: 天哪 我好久没回来了

translation.en: Remember, my dad doesn't trust me.
translation.zh: 记住 我爸不信任我

translation.en: -He's gonna be watching everything. -Dude, don't worry.
I mean, look at us. We're so cute and suburban, it's disgusting.
translation.zh: 看看咱俩这样子可爱又呆板 真让人反胃

translation.en: Come on, Peaches!
Okay, guys, I want you to listen to a song. All right, ready for this?
translation.zh: 各位 我要你们听一首歌好了 准备好了吗？

translation.en: She's my new favorite artist.
translation.zh: 她是我现在最喜欢的艺人

translation.en: -[softly] I hate you. -What?
-[Jake] I like this song. -Uncle Luke, play football with me.
translation.zh: -我喜欢这首歌-卢克叔叔 跟我一起玩球

translation.en: -[Luke] You bossing me around? -Yeah.
-[Luke] Okay. -[Spencer] Come on, Uncle Luke.
No, he's got an injury, little man. Let your uncle take it easy.
translation.zh: 不行 他受伤了 小家伙让你叔叔歇一歇

translation.en: -[scoffs] Take it easy? -[Hailey] Uncle Luke's hurt.
translation.zh: 卢克叔叔受伤了 歇一歇？才不要 来吧

translation.en: [Luke] Take it easy? Oh, heck, no. All right.
translation.zh: 歇一歇？才不要 来吧

translation.en: -[Jake] You sure? -[Luke] You're my walking stick.
translation.zh: 确定吗？你可以当我的拐杖

translation.en: -Be careful. -[Luke] She's right.
-[Jake] Yeah. -Hey, let me see that ball.
translation.zh: 对 嘿 把球给我看看

translation.en: -[Luke] I guess we're doing this. Yeah. -[Spencer giggles]
translation.zh: -扔得漂亮！对-看来要好好玩玩了

translation.en: Are y'all thinking about having kids?
Hey, Hailey, let her be a rock star first, okay?
translation.zh: 嘿 海莉 先让她当摇滚明星 好吗？

translation.en: Kids later.
-♪ You can try to hide it ♪ -Well…
He… He's really great with kids.
translation.zh: 他真的很会跟孩子相处

translation.en: -[Spencer] No, me! -Look at him.
-[Jake] Who first? -Me!
-[Jake] Here you go, Luke. Oh! -All right. Oh!
You throw it back.
-Twenty-two! Hut! -[Peaches barks]
[Hailey] I love the way you look at him. It's just so real.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你看他的眼神 太真实了

translation.en: -Hello? -[Cassie's Mom] Who is this?
-Who's this? -[Cassie's Mom] This is Cassie's mother.
Where is Cassie? I cannot reach her.
translation.zh: 卡茜在哪？我联系不上她

translation.en: [Luke] She… She's at work. Is everything okay?
-Marisol? -Huh?
Hi, I'm Luke Morrow. I'm Cassie's friend. You all right?
translation.zh: 嗨 我是卢克·莫罗卡茜的朋友 你没事吧？

translation.en: -[Marisol] Yeah, I'm fine. -Okay, what happened?
Uh, uh, I don't know. Someone broke the door and broke the window, I think.
translation.zh: 我不知道 有人砸破了门窗 我觉得…

translation.en: There's glass everywhere and-- Oh!
-I… I thought you had a show. -Thank you for coming.
translation.zh: -你不是在演出吗？-谢谢你赶来

translation.en: It's been 30 minutes since I called the police.
translation.zh: 从我报警到现在已经30分钟了

translation.en: -They don't rush for this neighborhood. -Oh, come on.
translation.zh: -他们不会急着来这里出警-拜托

translation.en: -Welcome to the ugly truth. -Ma'am.
Give me your keys. I'm gonna check it out.
translation.zh: 把钥匙给我 我去看看

translation.en: -There could be someone in there. -It's gonna be fine. Cassie, you stay with your mom. All right?
translation.zh: -不行 里面可能有人-没关系 卡茜 陪着你妈妈

translation.en: [Johnno] I just watched you introduce yourself to your own mother-in-law.
translation.zh: 我刚才看到你见到了岳母

translation.en: Man, you have no idea how much evidence I have to turn your ass in.
translation.zh: 你不知道我有多少证据足以把你送进监狱里

translation.en: -[vehicle speeds away] -[Johnno] Pay me.
[Cassie] Are you okay?
Hi. Why did you wait up?
translation.zh: 嗨 你为什么要等我？

translation.en: I couldn't get to sleep.
What did the cops say?
We'll get back to you… blah, blah, blah.
translation.zh: 我们会再联系你…乱七八糟的

translation.en: [sighs] I can't believe I have this show tomorrow.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信明天我还要演出

translation.en: -[chuckles] Tonight. -You don't look great, Cass. You okay?
translation.zh: -是今天-你脸色不太好 没事吧？

translation.en: -No, I'm fine. -When was the last time you ate?
translation.zh: -我没事-你上次吃东西是什么时候？

translation.en: I don't know.
-Whoa, whoa. Hey. -[monitor beeping] -[Cassie] Yeah. -[Peaches barks]
We're going to the couch. Put your weight on me. Yup.
translation.zh: 我们去沙发上 靠在我身上 对

translation.en: -[grunting] -[Cassie] Okay.
All right, let me just-- Okay. All right, hang on to me. [grunts] Hang on to me.
translation.zh: 好了 让我…好了 抓住我

translation.en: Okay. [sighs]
-All right. Glucose? -[Cassie] It's in my purse.
translation.zh: -好了 葡萄糖凝胶呢？-在我包里

translation.en: Purse.
-[Luke] Purse, purse. -[Peaches barking]
-Easy, Peaches. -[barking]
Okay. Okay.
I want you to grab a hold of me. Grab a hold of me. Yeah.
Yup, yup, yup, yup. Okay, come up. All right. [exhales]
-[panting] Okay. Okay. Open, open. -[labored breathing]
There you go. All right.
-Okay? Enough? All right. -Mmm. Mmm.
-Okay. -[Cassie inhales deeply]
How long does it take to work?
-[exhales] Like, 20 minutes. -[panting] Twenty minutes. Okay.
All right.
Relax, it's gonna be fine.
-[Peaches whimpering] -Yeah.
Your heart is going crazy.
That's because it's scary, dammit.
translation.zh: 因为真的很吓人 真该死

translation.en: [Cassie] See?
I'm letting you help me.
If you mess with that woman again, and you so much as look at my wife,
translation.zh: 如果你再招惹那个女人你再敢多看一眼我老婆

translation.en: I will kill you.
-[tense music playing] -Do you understand me?
This is everything I owe you.
translation.zh: 我欠你的钱都在这里了

translation.en: We're done.
I miss you like hell, man.
I hope you know that.
Hey, Frankie…
[sniffles] …you wanna hear something crazy?
translation.zh: 你想听件疯狂的事情吗？

translation.en: I think Cassie Salazar's my best friend.
translation.zh: 我觉得卡茜·萨拉扎是我最好的朋友

translation.en: I do.
[smacks lips] I love you.
Hi.
What's going on?
I just spoke to my mom.
[Luke] Oh. How's she doing?
She called because she was freaking out.
translation.zh: 她打电话来 是因为她吓坏了

translation.en: She was trying to get into her car just now,
and some guy with blood on his shirt
translation.zh: 一个衬衫上有血的男人

translation.en: rolled up, wanting to talk about you.
translation.zh: 突然出现 张口就是你的事情

translation.en: About you and me, and how we're in a fake marriage.
-Threatening to turn us in. -[spluttering]
She'll understand why though, right?
translation.zh: 她会明白其中缘由的 对吧？

translation.en: Why aren't you asking me who it was?
translation.zh: 你为什么不问我那人是谁？

translation.en: Fuck you, Luke. Fuck you!
-I'm sorry. -You owe him money?
This guy said. And that he sent you a message last night?
translation.zh: 这家伙说的 他还昨晚给你放了话？

translation.en: [Luke] I'm sorry. Okay? I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起 好吗？真的很抱歉

translation.en: They broke into my mother's house, Luke!
translation.zh: 他们闯进了我母亲的家 卢克！

translation.en: -I… I am so sorry. -Did you know?
You must have, right? That's why you said you'd pay for the damages.
translation.zh: 你一定知道 所以你想补偿损失

translation.en: -Can you let me explain? -Yes!
I'm an addict.
I'm clean now.
-Two years sober, okay? -And what? This guy was your dealer?
translation.zh: -戒毒两年了 好吗？-然后呢？ 这家伙是你之前的毒贩？

translation.en: That's why your dad stopped talking to you.
translation.zh: 所以你爸爸才不跟你说话

translation.en: Because you were using.
When my mom died, I, uh…
I got into her medication just to cope.
translation.zh: 为了缓解情绪 我就吃她之前的药

translation.en: But when I ran out, Johnno was right there to help me.
translation.zh: 但我都嗑完之后约翰诺及时出现 “帮我渡过难关”

translation.en: -What does that have anything to do-- -[Luke] Okay. Yeah. [grunts]
translation.zh: -那跟这件事有什么关系…-是这样

translation.en: I stole a $50,000 car from my dad.
translation.zh: 我从我爸那里偷了一辆价值五万美元的车

translation.en: A classic Corvette.
translation.zh: 雪佛兰科尔维特经典款

translation.en: He was rebuilding it for one of his biggest customers.
translation.zh: 他在为最重要的客户进行修复

translation.en: And I broke in.
I was out of my mind, and…
translation.zh: 我当时已经嗑嗨了 而且…

translation.en: I was desperate.
I was gonna sell it, and instead, I just…
translation.zh: 我本打算卖掉 但反之 我…

translation.en: took it on the freeway, and I totaled it.
translation.zh: 我开上了高速 撞毁了那车

translation.en: And he said if I didn't pay that customer back,
translation.zh: 他说如果我不赔给客户钱

translation.en: he'd turn me in himself.
translation.zh: 他就会亲自送我进监狱

translation.en: You weren't kidding about him.
translation.zh: 你之前说他 没在开玩笑

translation.en: Whatever I didn't have, I borrowed from Johnno.
translation.zh: 我一分钱也没有 只得找约翰诺借

translation.en: This is why you needed to marry me.
translation.zh: 这就是你和我结婚的原因

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah, but look.
I dealt with him.
-Okay? I paid him. It's done. -[inhales deeply]
translation.zh: 好吗？我已经还清了 都结束了

translation.en: [sobbing] They could have hurt her, and she's the only thing that I have.
translation.zh: 他们可能会伤到她的我只有她这一个亲人

translation.en: -I know, Cassie. I know, I know. -No. No.
translation.zh: -我知道 卡茜 我知道-不

translation.en: Don't… Don't just walk away.
Okay, I'm sorry.
Not every man you let into your life is a bad guy that you can't trust.
translation.zh: 并非所有被你接受的男人都是你不能信任的坏人

translation.en: Really, Luke? What are you?
translation.zh: 真的吗 卢克？那你是什么？

translation.en: I am someone who shows up when you need me.
translation.zh: 我是一个在你需要时及时出现的人

translation.en: I don't need you.
Just listen, okay? [sniffles]
I am so sorry.
-I messed up. -Go stay at your dad's or your brother's.
translation.zh: -是我没处理好-去你爸爸或者你哥哥家住吧

translation.en: And tell them that we're getting divorced.
translation.zh: 告诉他们 我们要离婚

translation.en: I'm gonna go to my show tonight,
but when I come back tomorrow, I want you gone.
translation.zh: 但等我明天回家 我希望你已经离开

translation.en: -We played so hard. What did you do? -[laughing]
translation.zh: 我们好卖力 你都干什么了？

translation.en: [Nora] I've never seen you play like that in your life!
translation.zh: -我还从来没见你那样表演过-好吧

translation.en: I know a bunch of those people out there. They're freaking out.
translation.zh: 外面有那么多粉丝 都热情到爆炸

translation.en: Marina, promoter from The Hollywood Bowl, wants you to open
translation.zh: 好莱坞露天剧场的玛丽娜 想让你们两、三周后为弗洛伦斯与机器乐队开场

translation.en: for Florence and the Machine in a couple weeks.
translation.zh: 想让你们两、三周后为弗洛伦斯与机器乐队开场

translation.en: What? [Toby] The Loyal and Florence and the Machine.
translation.zh: -什么？-忠诚乐队和弗洛伦斯与机器乐队

translation.en: -What? -This is massive!
[Nora] Hollywood Bowl!
[man] Lance Corporal Morrow, I need you to return to base with me.
translation.zh: 莫罗准下士我需要你和我一起回基地

translation.en: I'll give you a few minutes to grab your gear.
translation.zh: 我给你几分钟时间收拾行囊

translation.en: Hello?
[Jacob] Luke wants you to know that he's been charged with fraud and detained.
translation.zh: 卢克想让你知道他被指控诈骗已经被拘留

translation.en: They've said you two have a fake marriage in order to get benefits.
translation.zh: 他们说你们俩 为骗取津贴假结婚

translation.en: Is this true?
Wait, where is Luke?
[Jacob] I'm headed to base to see him now. There's gonna be a trial in a few weeks.
translation.zh: 我现在要去基地见他几周后就要开庭

translation.en: Then you'll also be hearing from the police about your role in all this.
translation.zh: 你也会收到警方对你的指控

translation.en: -Was it all an act? -Uh…
No.
Not… Not all of it.
Even I thought you were good for him.
I thought you were bringing my son back to me.
translation.zh: 我以为你把我儿子带回了我身边

translation.en: Hi.
[court official] All rise.
Good morning. Be seated.
We're here today for a hearing in the case
translation.zh: 我们今天在此就准下士卢克·莫罗案件

translation.en: of Lance Corporal Luke A. Morrow.
Lance Corporal Morrow stands accused
of entering into a fraudulent marriage in order to collect BAH
translation.zh: 缔结欺诈性婚姻以领取住房基本津贴

translation.en: and FSA pay in violation of article 132 of the UCMJ.
translation.zh: 和家庭分居津贴 违反了《美国海军陆战队法》第132条

translation.en: We have a signed affidavit from Jonathan Deluca's testimony
translation.zh: 我们有一份乔纳森·德卢卡的署名证词

translation.en: of the fraudulent marriage.
translation.zh: 证明了这桩欺诈性婚姻

translation.en: Lance Corporal Morrow's wife, Miss Salazar, is a civilian.
translation.zh: 莫罗准下士之妻子萨拉扎女士为普通公民

translation.en: So, her case will be referred to state authorities,
translation.zh: 因此她的案件将被移交到州政府

translation.en: and they may pursue criminal charges.
translation.zh: 她可能会面临刑事指控

translation.en: They will have access to the transcripts of these proceedings.
translation.zh: 州政府将有权访问诉讼程序的记录

translation.en: -I wanna make a statement. -Lance Corporal, I can't advise that.

translation.en: [softly] What?
-[murmuring] -Luke.

[Luke] Sir.
I coerced Miss Salazar into marrying me.

translation.en: Um, she didn't know that it violated military law.

translation.en: -I assured her it didn't. -No.

translation.en: I bear full responsibility,
and I'm prepared to face the consequences of my actions.

translation.en: [judge] Very well.
-Then I find you guilty. -[gasps]
[judge] Lance Corporal Morrow,
upon completion of your sentence, you'll be discharged for bad conduct.
translation.zh: 刑满后 你将因行为不端被除名

translation.en: You will report for your six-month sentence
tomorrow at 1700 hours.
Given the outcome of this trial, this court will not
translation.zh: 鉴于本案的审理结果本院将不把萨拉扎小姐的案件

translation.en: refer Miss Salazar's case to the local authorities.
[minister] Do you pledge to love this man?
translation.zh: 你愿意发誓爱这个人吗？

translation.en: To be true and loyal to him
and to comfort and keep him
in sickness and in health.
I do.
[minister] By the power vested in me by the great State of California,
translation.zh: 根据加利福尼亚州赋予我的合法权力

translation.en: it is my honor to pronounce you
husband and wife.
You may kiss the bride.
